name: GraalOnline Ol'West+
description:
Come to Ol'West and play with other cowboys and cowgirls in a western themed MMO! Ride horses, throw lassos, shoot with various colts and guns! Chat and meet your friends from the other GraalOnline games Classic, Era and Zone.

This plus version includes the customization pack which let's you choose from hundreds of outfits and lets you change your profile status.

This game requires an internet connection.
